skills.title: Video Production
skills.description: Specializing in small broadcasts utilizing automations and data driven graphics with locked off cameras to make the production feel bigger.

skills.title: Photography
skills.description: Sports photographer skilled in capturing action on the field or mastering lighting in the studio.

skills.title: Graphic Design
skills.description: Skilled in print and digital, specializing in template driven design to enable quickly turning out content for the web, social or physical media.

skills.title: Video Editing
skills.description: Knowledgeable in non-linear video editing and basic motion graphics including MORGT design and use.

skills.title: Programming
skills.description: Proficient in several programing languages having created many custom programs for managing broadcast data, social media and web site data.

skills.title: Photo Finish Timing
skills.description: Adept in all aspects of cross country and track & field timing including photo finish and RFID chip timing as well as meet management software.
